inclusion.criterion: Indication to initiate chronic NIV in COPD patients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Existence of a sufficient social support network making initiation of HMV at home possible and safe.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Instable severe cardiac comorbidities (left ventricular ejection fraction below 45%, instable angina pectoris complaints)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients admitted to a nursing home
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. They have been discharged from the hospital and are now presenting with agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia.
